description: This Dart file defines several state management classes for a Flutter application, including providers for authentication, games, leaderboard, and settings, utilizing ChangeNotifier and shared_preferences for persistence.

classes.name: _LoadableState
classes.description: A base class with loading and error state management, extending ChangeNotifier for notification.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Manages user authentication tokens, handles sign-in/sign-out, and persists token data.

classes.name: GameItem
classes.description: A simple model class representing a game item with id and title.

classes.name: GamesProvider
classes.description: Fetches and stores a list of games from an API, with fallback mock data.

classes.name: LeaderboardEntry
classes.description: Model for leaderboard entries including rank, player, and points.

classes.name: LeaderboardProvider
classes.description: Loads and maintains leaderboard data from API, with fallback mock data.

classes.name: SettingsProvider
classes.description: Stores user-configurable settings like notifications, contrast, and language, with persistence.

methods.name: setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state and notifies listeners.

methods.name: setError
methods.description: Sets the error message and notifies listeners.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider, loading persisted data or tokens.

methods.name: signInWithToken
methods.description: Signs in with a token, persists it, and updates API and state.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Signs out the user, clearing token and preferences.

methods.name: fetchGames
methods.description: Fetches the list of games from the API, with fallback.

methods.name: fetchLeaderboard
methods.description: Fetches leaderboard data from the API, with fallback.

methods.name: setNotifications
methods.description: Updates notifications setting and persists it.

methods.name: setHighContrast
methods.description: Updates high contrast setting and persists it.

methods.name: setLanguage
methods.description: Updates language setting and persists it.
